<meeli><table class="infobox vevent" cellspacing="5" style="width:22em; font-size: 90%"><tr><th colspan="2" class="summary" style="text-align:center; font-size:125%; font-weight:bold; font-size: 110%; font-style: italic">Little Miss Sunshine</th>
</tr><tr class=""><td colspan="2" class="" style="text-align:center;"><a href="/wiki/File:Little_miss_sunshine_poster.jpg" class="image"><img alt="The movie poster shows the family featured in the film chasing a Volkswagen Microbus. The title of the film is located above the vehicle. From left to right: the mother (wearing sunglasses, a white long-sleeve shirt, and pink pants) is in a running stance behind the vehicle, the son (wearing a yellow short-sleeve shirt and black pants) is pushing the vehicle, the uncle (wearing a pink short-sleeve shirt, a white long-sleeve shirt, white pants, and has a black beard) is in a running stance, the daughter (wearing a red headband, red shirt, blue shorts, and glasses) is near the open door of the vehicle, the grandfather (wearing a white t-shirt, a black vest, and gray pants) is seated in the vehicle reaching for the daughter, and the father (wearing a red t-shirt and sunglasses) is driving the vehicle and looking back at his family. The poster has an all-yellow background and, at the top, features the cast's names and reviews by critics. The bottom of the poster includes the film's credits, rating, and release date." src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/1/16/Little_miss_sunshine_poster.jpg/220px-Little_miss_sunshine_poster.jpg" width="220" height="325"></a> <span style="font-size: 95%; line-height: 1.5em">Theatrical release poster</span></td>

</tr><tr class=""><th scope="row" style="text-align:left;">Original run</th>

Brad Falchuk

</tr><tr class=""><td colspan="2" class="" style="text-align:center;"><a href="/wiki/File:Sesame_Street_logo.svg" class="image"><img alt="Sesame Street logo.svg" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/0/08/Sesame_Street_logo.svg/230px-Sesame_Street_logo.svg.png" width="230" height="87"></a> <span style="">The logo since 2001</span></td>

</tr><tr class=""><th scope="row" style="text-align:left;">Created by</th>
<td class="" style=""><a href="/wiki/Joan_Ganz_Cooney" title="Joan Ganz Cooney">Joan Ganz Cooney</a> <a href="/wiki/Lloyd_Morrisett" title="Lloyd Morrisett">Lloyd Morrisett</a></td>

<meeli><table class="infobox vevent" cellspacing="5" style="width:22em;"><tr><th colspan="2" class="summary" style="text-align:center; font-size:125%; font-weight:bold; background-color: #EEDD82">Film Independent's Spirit Awards</th>
</tr><tr class=""><td colspan="2" class="" style="text-align:center;"><a href="/wiki/File:Spirit_Awards_Trophy.png" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/d/d8/Spirit_Awards_Trophy.png/225px-Spirit_Awards_Trophy.png" width="225" height="431"></a></td>

<meeli><table class="infobox vevent" cellspacing="5" style="width:22em; font-size: 90%"><tr><th colspan="2" class="summary" style="text-align:center; font-size:125%; font-weight:bold; font-size: 110%; font-style: italic">Nashville</th>
</tr><tr class=""><td colspan="2" class="" style="text-align:center;"><a href="/wiki/File:49793.1010.A.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/0c/49793.1010.A.jpg" width="220" height="323"></a> <span style="font-size: 95%; line-height: 1.5em">Theatrical release poster</span></td>

<td class="description" style=""><a href="/wiki/Robert_Altman" title="Robert Altman">Robert Altman</a></td>
</tr><tr class=""><th scope="row" style="text-align:left; white-space: nowrap">Produced by</th>

<meeli><table class="infobox vevent" cellspacing="5" style="width:22em; font-size: 90%"><tr><th colspan="2" class="summary" style="text-align:center; font-size:125%; font-weight:bold; font-size: 110%; font-style: italic">Trixie</th>
</tr><tr class=""><td colspan="2" class="" style="text-align:center;"><a href="/wiki/File:Trixie-film.jpg" class="image"><img alt="" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/6/64/Trixie-film.jpg/175px-Trixie-film.jpg" width="175" height="254"></a> <span style="font-size: 95%; line-height: 1.5em">Official DVD Cover</span></td>
